name: EcoSynergy System Ltd.
goal:
Changing the habits of consumers and industry in waste management.
- New equipment for waste management
- A new system in the store
- A new service system
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Communication, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Directive of the European Parliament and of the Council 94/62/EC on packaging and packaging waste;
- Directive of the European Parliament and of the Council 2008/98/EC on waste;
- COMMISSION DECISION establishing a system for the identification of packaging materials in accordance with Directive 94/62 / EC of the European Parliament and of the Council on packaging and packaging waste;
- COMMISSION DIRECTIVE 2013/2 / EU amending Annex I to Directive 94/62 / EC of the European Parliament and of the Council on packaging and packaging waste
- Commission Communication "Closing the loop – An EU action plan for the Circular Economy";
